io.spine.server.entity.storage

Class Columns

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.spine.server.entity.storage.Columns

  • @Internal
public class Columns
extends java.lang.Object
    A utility for generating the columns Map.

    The methods of all entities that fit the Java Bean getter spec and annotated with Column are considered columns.

    Inherited columns are taken into account too, but building entity hierarchies is strongly discouraged.

    Note that the returned type of a EntityColumn getter must either be primitive or serializable, otherwise a runtime exception is thrown when trying to get an instance of EntityColumn.

    When passing an instance of an already known Entity type, the getters are retrieved from a cache and are not updated.

    See Also:
    EntityColumn

      static void checkColumnDefinitions(EntityClass<?> entityClass)
      Ensures that the entity columns are valid for the specified entity class and caches them.
